name: Lucky Alliance
description:
Game Developed by: Marco Minganna

Theme: Stronger together.

Hours spent in the GameJam: ~30.

Music: youtube studio -https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UC7IMgrQDSFcmGNs9uQMnwXA/music

How to play:

Default: 

WASD for movement. 

Space bar to invert the second Daruma movements.

Keyboard setting can be modified in the Game Settings.

Description:

Complete the Lucky charms with the help of the Daruma dolls. 

Their movement is syncronised but if you press the mirror button they will move in the opposite way. 

Objective: 

Follow the objective on the bottom left corner of the screen and position your doll/s in the right space to unlock the lucky charm!
